headline: Hardin County Democrats Presidents Day Luncheon
sentences: The Hardin County Democratic Party will host its annual Presidents Day Luncheon on Saturday, February 26, 2022, from noon until 2:00PM at the Kenton Moose Lodge (lower level) located at 801 West Lima Ave., Kenton, OH.
Governor, Jeff Crossman (State Representative) for Attorney General and Jeff Sites (Army veteran and warehouse manager) for US Congress.
Candidates scheduled to speak include John Cranley (Cincinnati Mayor) for Governor, Cheryl Stevens (Cuyahoga County Council) for Lt.
Those interested may RSVP by February 18, 2022 at hardindemocrats@gmail.com or facebook.com/hcodems or by calling 419-494-4558.
The luncheon meal will include pork chops, salmon, carrots, corn, cheesy potatoes, assorted pie and drinks.
Afterwards there will be a silent auction, crocheted afghan drawing and 50/50 drawing.
The cost is $20 per person/$10 for students thru college.
Carryout meals are available for pickup prior to noon.
